Honorific.script:
{if system.allegiance = "Empire":
    {if cmdr.empirerating <= 4:
       commander
    |elif cmdr.empirerating = 5:
        sir
    |elif cmdr.empirerating <= 11:
        my lord
    |elif cmdr.empirerating = 12:
        your grace
    |elif cmdr.empirerating = 13:
        your royal highness
    |elif cmdr.empirerating = 14:
        your majesty
    }
|elif system.allegiance = "Federation":
    {if cmdr.federationrating= 0:
        commander
    |else:
        {cmdr.federationrank}
    }
|else:
    commander
}
Honorific.name: Honorific
Honorific.description: Function to provide a suitable honorific for your commander

Station report.description: Function to report on the details of the current station

System report.script:
{OneOf("This is", "This system is", "{P(system.name)} is")}
{if system.allegiance = "Federation":
    a Federation
|elif system.allegiance = "Empire":
    an Empire
|else:
    an independent
}
{if system.government:
    {system.government}
|else:
  system
}
{OneOf("of", "with a population of", "home to", "supporting")} {Humanise(system.population)} {OneOf("people", "souls")}
{if system.power:
    , {OneOf("aligned to", "allied with", "controlled by")} {P(system.power)}
}.

{if system.faction:
  {P(system.faction)} is the {OneOf("controlling", "local", "immediate")} {OneOf("power", "faction")}.
}

{if len(system.stations) = 0:
  There are no stations
|else:
    {if len(system.orbitalstations) = 0:
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} planetary station
        |else:
            There are {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    |elif len(system.orbitalstations) = 1:
        There is {OneOf("a single", "a lone", "just one", "one")} orbital station
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
        |elif len(system.planetarystations) > 1:
            and {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    |else:
        There are {len(system.orbitalstations)} orbital stations
        {if len(system.planetarystations) = 1:
            and {OneOf("a lone", "a single", "one")} planetary station
        |else:
            and {len(system.planetarystations)} planetary stations
        }
    }
}
{OneOf("here", "in this system")}.

{_ TODO: system state}

System report.description: Function to report on the details of the current star system
